name: Winged Sakura: Mindy's Arc
blurb: A fast-paced stunning HD 2D Anime themed strategy defense game mixed with RPG mechanics for PC, Mac, and Linux.

rewards.reward: Digital Copy of Winged Sakura: Mindy's Arc [Early Price]\r\n************************************************ \r\nTHANK YOU for your early support. You will receive A DRM-free digital copy of the game for one of the supported PC platforms. Includes a Steam key when greenlit.

Digital Copy of Winged Sakura: Mindy's Arc [Retail Price]\r\n************************************************ \r\nTHANK YOU for full support! You will receive A DRM-free digital copy of the game for one of the supported PC platforms. Includes a Steam key when greenlit.

Digital Soundtrack\r\n************************************************\r\nYou will receive a DRM-free digital copy of the game for one of the supported PC platforms (Includes a Steam key if greenlit) and a digital copy of the game's soundtrack.

BETA Access
************************************************
Includes $15 tier and BETA access. BETA is estimated to start in mid August. Get the game before anyone else and help provide feedback!
************************************************
All pledges $30 and higher will also receive BETA Access.
************************************************
Your name will be credited under Special Thanks (Optional)

Digital Soundtrack + BETA Access\r\n************************************************\r\nIncludes all pledge rewards for tiers $30 and lower. BETA is estimated to start in mid August. Get the game before anyone else and help provide feedback!

Digital Artbook + Digital Soundtrack
************************************************
Includes $25 tier and a digital copy of the game's art book. The art book will include all CG images used in the game, story character art, Spirit art, BG and sketches.
************************************************
Please allow an additional month after the game is shipped for us to ensure the highest quality possible is delivered.

28"x16" Wall Scroll
************************************************
Includes $50 tier and a 28"x16" physical wall scroll. Please see project description for a sample.
************************************************ We'll send out a survey and let you choose which image you want us to print a few days after the game is shipped.

16"x24" Poster\r\n************************************************\r\nIncludes the $50 tier and a 16"x24" Poster. We only have ONE image for this poster. It's the same image used for the 32" wide wall scroll. Unlike the 16" wide wall scroll, you cannot choose a different design. Please see our project description for more information.

Physical Art Book\r\n************************************************\r\nIncludes $50 tier and a physical copy of the game's art book. (Softcover) ************************************************ Please allow an additional month after the game is shipped for us to ensure the highest quality possible is delivered.

32"x42" Wall Scroll\r\n************************************************\r\nIncludes the $50 tier and a 32"x42" Wall Scroll. We only have ONE image for this wall scroll. Unlike the 16" Wall Scroll, you cannot choose a different design. Please see our project description for more information.

Sakura Contractor\r\n************************************************\r\nIncludes all the above tiers. Get your hands to all the wall scrolls we have to offer (8+). If we add any other merchandise, it will also be included. This tier also includes the poster and physical art book.
